ai-tha-ap311:1.1_0: A person who slays their mother
ai-tha-ap311:1.2_0: I was drunken on the rainy season.
ai-tha-ap311:1.3_0: the forest, having come to the forest,
ai-tha-ap311:2.1_0: I saw a dreaming while dreaming.
ai-tha-ap311:2.2_0: the benefit of the world in its gods,
ai-tha-ap311:2.3_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
ai-tha-ap311:2.4_0: they are reborn in a good place.
ai-tha-ap311:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap311:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap311:3.4_0: this fruit is the perception of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap311:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap311:6.1_0: (who) is the ninth Elder Nuns’ lady,
